properties.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region; Orofino/Grangeville Region
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 7:36PM MST until February 7 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
overnight, mainly above 2000 feet. Trace amounts of snow are
possible overnight in Orofino.

* WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade,
Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM PST...8 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST/ 8 AM MST FRIDAY
